name: super-fang
effect: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target’s remaining HP.
short_effect: Inflicts damage equal to half the target’s HP.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target’s HP in half.
